Uses of Interface
ca.concordia.model.Order

  • Packages that use Order 
    Package Description
    ca.concordia.model  

    • Uses of Order in ca.concordia.model

      Classes in ca.concordia.model that implement Order 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Advance
      move armies between 2 neighbor countries
      class  Airlift
      Airlift order, move armies between the territories of a single player which are not(or can be) neighbors.
      class  Attack
      attack from source country to destination country
      class  Blockade
      reinforces the number of armies inside the coutnry by 3 times.
      class  Bomb
      order to halve the number of armies of the opponents' neighbor territories
      class  Deploy
      place armies in the destination teritory
      class  Negotiate
      prevent the first attack on the player if the defender has the Negotiation/Diplomacy card
      Methods in ca.concordia.model that return Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Order PlayerStrategy.createOrder()
      method that will be called bt the Player to do some actions that depand on the adopted ConcreteStrategy.
      Order BenevolentPlayer.createOrder()
      BenevolentPlayer can only use Deploy order.
      Order CheaterPlayer.createOrder()
      Conquers all the immediate neighboring enemy countries and then doubles the number of armies on its countries that have enemy neighbors.
      Order RandomPlayer.createOrder()
      The random player can either determine deploy or advance, determined randomly
      Order AggressivePlayer.createOrder()
      The random player can either determine deploy or advance, determined randomly
      Order Player.next_order()
      Method that is called by the GameEngine during the execute orders phase and returns the first order in the playerâ€™s list of orders, then removes it from the list.
      Methods in ca.concordia.model with parameters of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.issue_order(Order p_order, Orders p_type)
      Function to add an order to the list of orders held by the player when the game engine calls it during the issue orders phase.
